column4: heya guys i am using fdisk to repartition my /home partition... running  fdisk /dev/sda I get a message saying  Partition 3 does not start on physical sector boundary.
i jsut used fdisk to create a new partition and its saying /dev/sda3             919G   14G  860G   2% /home
hows that possible
i jsut deleted it...
it is unmonuted
when nothing is in there
no Oer
i sjut dd'ed it to zero
its seems its used for super user
usually 5% is set aside for root, although that can be changed.
how can that be set?
I'm currently already scrathing my head trying to remember >.<
I'm not sure it will allow -m 0  did it give you an error?
no it seems it did the job correctly buty still 14gb used...
ahh ok, may change on a reboot I imagine.
well see.. rebooting the server now
I remember losts of things I have read, just not always where/what/when I read them >.<

odd
this is impossible lol
